title: [Lava Flows, Greening]
description: Tufts of savannah grass poke through the cracked layers of black rock.  No new lava has flowed here in years, and life has begun to reclaim some of the wasteland.
Bright green tufts of savannah grass poke through the cracked layers of black rock.  No new lava has flowed here in years, and life has begun to reclaim some of the wasteland.
